alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison, northeastern Limestone and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Fayetteville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Ardmore, New Market, Harvest, Lincoln, Elkwood and Dellrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
